actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to require that skilled nursing homes furnishing services under the medicare and medicaid programs be adequately equipped with wheelchairs and other appropriate equipment and supplies.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require that skilled nursing facilities be adequately equipped with wheelchairs and other appropriate equipment and supplies.

titles.title: A bill to require that skilled nursing homes furnishing services under the medicare and medicaid programs be adequately equipped with wheelchairs and other appropriate equipment and supplies.
